subject: Fw: [Total Contacts] New customer order (28507) - September 9, 2024
preview: Hi Elise,  We have updated the site and adjusted the caching settings. I think this will solve the problem. Let monitor and let me know if this happens again.

full_threads.body:
Hi Elise,

We have updated the site and adjusted the caching settings. I think this will solve the problem. Let monitor and let me know if this happens again.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Afternoon guys,

Can you please have a look at what could be causing this?
It looks to be a similar issue to what I emailed about on Tuesday.

We've had other orders come through today without issue, so I'm at a loss as to what this could be?


Kind regards,


Elise



​www.totalcontacts.com.au

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts


From: Felicity Evans <evans.felicity@outlook.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 19 December 2024 4:20 PM
To: Total Contacts <info@totalcontacts.com.au>
Subject: Re: [Total Contacts] New customer order (28507) - September 9, 2024

Hi Elise,

Thanks for getting back to me so quickly.

Please find screenshots attached of my cart (incorrect product - Acuvue), and the pop up cart on the right hand side (correct product - Proview), when I click through to the cart from the pop-up it reverts back to Acuvue.

I have cleared my cookies and caches.

It does the same thing when I try in incognito mode.

When I try to add Proview's to my cart (without using reorder function) the same problem happens (Acuvue appearing instead of Proview).

Hope this helps.

Cheers,

Felicity

From: Total Contacts <info@totalcontacts.com.au>
Date: Thursday, 19 December 2024 at 3:39 pm
To: Felicity Evans <evans.felicity@outlook.com.au>
Subject: Re: [Total Contacts] New customer order (28507) - September 9, 2024

Hi Felicity,

I'm sorry to hear you're having troubles with the site.

As we are an online platform I am unable to process a manual payment, but I'll try to troubleshoot for you for an immediate fix , if you're able to do the following (I'll still be escalating this to the tech team):

  • Could you please send through a photo or screenshot of the product in your cart, vs the product you're trying to order
  • If you haven't already, can you please clear your cookies and caches from your device
  • Does the same issue come up if you order the product and script you're after without using the re-order function?
  • Finally, does the same issue come up if you switch your browser to incognito mode?

The more information I can give the tech team the better 🙂

Let me know how you get on, hopefully we can resolve this as quickly as possible for you.

Kind regards,

Elise

​www.totalcontacts.com.au

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

From: Felicity Evans <evans.felicity@outlook.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 19 December 2024 3:15 PM
To: Total Contacts <info@totalcontacts.com.au>
Subject: Re: [Total Contacts] New customer order (28507) - September 9, 2024

Hi Elise,

Many thanks for handling my order several months ago.

I have just tried to place the exact same order by using the 'reorder' function, however, there seems to be a problem with the website as my cart is instead showing a different product "Acuvue Oasys" and it's not letting me remove it.

Would you be able to please process this order manually for me? I'm happy for you to use the same card details.

Kind regards,

Felicity

From: Total Contacts <info@totalcontacts.com.au>
Date: Tuesday, 10 September 2024 at 1:07 pm
To: Felicity Evans <evans.felicity@outlook.com.au>

I have express posted some trial lenses to you, they can be tracked here:

Track your parcels - Australia Post (auspost.com.au)

Kind regards,

Elise

​www.totalcontacts.com.au

Subject: Re: [Total Contacts] New customer order (28507) - September 9, 2024

Hi Elise,

Kind regards,

Felicity

From: Total Contacts <info@totalcontacts.com.au>
Date: Monday, 9 September 2024 at 12:54 pm
To: Felicity Evans <evans.felicity@outlook.com.au>
Subject: Re: [Total Contacts] New customer order (28507) - September 9, 2024

Hi Felicity,

I have placed an order for 10 pairs of trials for you. The supplier is unable to send them direct to patient, so they will be sent to our office in Hobart and we will express post them up to you. I'll forward tracking to you when I have them packaged and ready to go.

Reagrding the back-order, we will let you know of any changes in ETA.

Kind regards,

Elise

​www.totalcontacts.com.au

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

From: Felicity Evans <evans.felicity@outlook.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 9 September 2024 11:58 AM
To: Total Contacts <info@totalcontacts.com.au>
Subject: Re: [Total Contacts] New customer order (28507) - September 9, 2024

Hi Elise,

Thank you for your email.

That's not a problem, I'm happy to proceed with the order.

Could you please let me know urgently if you anticipate that there will be any further delays?

Cheers,

Felicity

From: Total Contacts <info@totalcontacts.com.au>
Date: Monday, 9 September 2024 at 11:37 am
To: Felicity Evans <evans.felicity@outlook.com.au>
Subject: Re: [Total Contacts] New customer order (28507) - September 9, 2024

Hi Felicity,

Thank you for choosing Total Contacts.

We have been notified by the supplier of your lenses that there is unfortunately a nationwide back-order of your order, with a delivery date of 30/09/2024.

We appreciate that this may cause an inconvenience, and are more than happy to process a refund if you would prefer not to wait for stock to become available with the supplier.

Please let us know how you would like to proceed.

Kind regards,

Elise

​www.totalcontacts.com.au

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts
